name: @greirson/mcp-todoist
description: Manage your Todoist tasks, projects, and comments seamlessly using natural language commands. Create, update, complete, and organize tasks and projects efficiently with support for bulk operations and rich task attributes. Enhance productivity by integrating Todoist task management directly into your workflow.

tools.name: todoist_task_create
tools.description: Create a new task in Todoist with optional description, due date, priority, labels, deadline, project, and section

labels.description: Array of label names to assign to the task (optional)

due_string.description: Natural language due date like 'tomorrow', 'next Monday', 'Jan 23' (optional)

project_id.description: Project ID to assign the task to (optional)

section_id.description: Section ID within the project to assign the task to (optional)

deadline_date.description: Task deadline in YYYY-MM-DD format (when user mentions 'deadline') (optional)

tools.name: todoist_task_get
tools.description: Retrieve tasks from Todoist with optional filtering or get a specific task by ID

lang.description: Language for filter parsing, defaults to 'en' (optional)

limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to return (optional)

task_id.description: Get a specific task by its ID (optional, takes precedence over filtering)

tools.name: todoist_task_update
tools.description: Update an existing task found by ID or partial name search. Supports updating content, description, due date, priority, labels, deadline, project, and section

labels.description: Array of label names to assign to the task (optional)

task_id.description: Task ID to update (optional, takes precedence over task_name)

task_name.description: Partial task name to search for (case-insensitive, used if task_id not provided)

due_string.description: New due date in natural language like 'tomorrow', 'next Monday' (optional)

project_id.description: Move task to this project ID (optional)

section_id.description: Move task to this section ID (optional)

tools.name: todoist_task_delete
tools.description: Delete a task found by ID or partial name search (case-insensitive)

task_id.description: Task ID to delete (optional, takes precedence over task_name)

task_name.description: Partial task name to search for deletion (used if task_id not provided)

tools.name: todoist_task_complete
tools.description: Mark a task as complete found by ID or partial name search (case-insensitive)

task_id.description: Task ID to complete (optional, takes precedence over task_name)

task_name.description: Partial task name to search for completion (used if task_id not provided)

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_create
tools.description: Create multiple tasks at once for improved efficiency. Each task can have full attributes like individual task creation.

labels.description: Array of label names to assign to the task (optional)

due_string.description: Natural language due date like 'tomorrow', 'next Monday' (optional)

project_id.description: Project ID to assign the task to (optional)

section_id.description: Section ID to assign the task to (optional)

tasks.description: Array of task objects to create

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_update
tools.description: Update multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Very efficient for updating many tasks with the same changes.

labels.description: Array of label names to assign (optional)

due_string.description: New due date in natural language (optional)

project_id.description: Move matching tasks to this project ID or name (optional)

section_id.description: Move matching tasks to this section (optional)

updates.description: Updates to apply to matching tasks

due_after.description: Filter tasks due after this date (YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

due_before.description: Filter tasks due before this date (YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

project_id.description: Filter tasks by project ID (optional, does not support names)

content_contains.description: Filter tasks containing this text in content (optional)

search_criteria.description: Criteria to find tasks to update

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_delete
tools.description: Delete multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Use with caution - this will permanently delete matching tasks.

priority.description: Delete tasks with this priority level 1-4 (optional)

due_after.description: Delete tasks due after this date (YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

due_before.description: Delete tasks due before this date (YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

project_id.description: Delete tasks from this project ID (optional)

content_contains.description: Delete tasks containing this text in content (optional)

tools.name: todoist_tasks_bulk_complete
tools.description: Complete multiple tasks at once based on search criteria. Efficiently mark many tasks as done.

priority.description: Complete tasks with this priority level 1-4 (optional)

due_after.description: Complete tasks due after this date (YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

due_before.description: Complete tasks due before this date (YYYY-MM-DD) (optional)

project_id.description: Complete tasks from this project ID (optional)

content_contains.description: Complete tasks containing this text in content (optional)

tools.name: todoist_project_get
tools.description: Get a list of all projects from Todoist with their IDs and names

tools.name: todoist_section_get
tools.description: Get a list of sections within a project from Todoist with their IDs and names

project_id.description: Project ID to get sections for (optional - if not provided, gets sections for all projects)

tools.name: todoist_project_create
tools.description: Create a new project in Todoist

is_favorite.description: Whether to mark the project as favorite (optional)

tools.name: todoist_section_create
tools.description: Create a new section within a project in Todoist

project_id.description: Project ID where the section will be created

tools.name: todoist_comment_create
tools.description: Add a comment to a task in Todoist by task ID or task name

task_id.description: ID of the task to comment on (optional if task_name is provided)

task_name.description: Name/content of the task to comment on (optional if task_id is provided)

file_type.description: MIME type of the attached file

tools.name: todoist_comment_get
tools.description: Get comments for a task or project in Todoist

task_id.description: ID of the task to get comments for (optional)

task_name.description: Name/content of the task to get comments for (optional)

project_id.description: ID of the project to get comments for (optional)

tools.name: todoist_label_get
tools.description: Get all labels in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_label_create
tools.description: Create a new label in Todoist

name.description: Name of the label to create

color.description: Color of the label (optional) - can be a Todoist color name or hex code

is_favorite.description: Whether the label should be marked as favorite (optional)

tools.name: todoist_label_update
tools.description: Update an existing label in Todoist

order.description: New order position for the label (optional)

label_id.description: ID of the label to update (optional if label_name is provided)

label_name.description: Name of the label to update (optional if label_id is provided)

is_favorite.description: Whether the label should be marked as favorite (optional)

tools.name: todoist_label_delete
tools.description: Delete a label from Todoist

label_id.description: ID of the label to delete (optional if label_name is provided)

label_name.description: Name of the label to delete (optional if label_id is provided)

tools.name: todoist_label_stats
tools.description: Get usage statistics for all labels in Todoist

tools.name: todoist_subtask_create
tools.description: Create a new subtask under a parent task in Todoist

labels.description: Array of label names to apply to the subtask

priority.description: Priority level (1-4, where 4 is highest priority)

parent_task_id.description: ID of the parent task (optional if parent_task_name is provided)

parent_task_name.description: Name/content of the parent task (optional if parent_task_id is provided)

tools.name: todoist_subtasks_bulk_create
tools.description: Create multiple subtasks under a parent task in a single operation

parent_task_id.description: ID of the parent task (optional if parent_task_name is provided)

parent_task_name.description: Name/content of the parent task (optional if parent_task_id is provided)

tools.name: todoist_task_convert_to_subtask
tools.description: Convert an existing task to a subtask of another task

task_id.description: ID of the task to convert (optional if task_name is provided)

task_name.description: Name/content of the task to convert (optional if task_id is provided)

parent_task_id.description: ID of the parent task (optional if parent_task_name is provided)

parent_task_name.description: Name/content of the parent task (optional if parent_task_id is provided)

tools.name: todoist_subtask_promote
tools.description: Promote a subtask to a main task (remove parent relationship)

project_id.description: ID of the project to move the task to (optional)

section_id.description: ID of the section to move the task to (optional)

subtask_id.description: ID of the subtask to promote (optional if subtask_name is provided)

subtask_name.description: Name/content of the subtask to promote (optional if subtask_id is provided)

tools.name: todoist_task_hierarchy_get
tools.description: Get a task with all its subtasks in a hierarchical structure

task_id.description: ID of the task to get hierarchy for (optional if task_name is provided)

task_name.description: Name/content of the task to get hierarchy for (optional if task_id is provided)

include_completed.description: Include completed tasks in the hierarchy (default: false)

tools.name: todoist_test_connection
tools.description: Test the connection to Todoist API and verify API token validity

tools.name: todoist_test_all_features
tools.description: Run comprehensive tests on all Todoist MCP features to verify functionality

mode.description: Test mode: 'basic' for read-only API tests, 'enhanced' for full CRUD testing (default: basic)

tools.name: todoist_test_performance
tools.description: Measure performance and response times of Todoist API operations

iterations.description: Number of iterations to run for each test (default: 5)
